translation.zh: （格陵兰 根据1905年最新信息来源）

translation.en: Go see what it is, quickly. Hand me the lantern.
translation.zh: 去看看是什么 快点 把提灯给我

translation.en: It's the captain! It's the captain!

translation.zh: 长官 你找到什么了吗？

translation.en: -Help Jørgensen. His feet are frozen. -[man 2] Right, come on.
translation.zh: 帮帮约根森 他的脚冻僵了 好的 快

translation.en: -[man 3] Holm's on his way. -[man 1] Quick, Unger. Get the water.
translation.zh: -霍尔姆在路上了 -快点 昂格尔 拿水

translation.en: -Unger, hurry up with the water. -It's coming!
-[man 4] Raise it. Easy. -[man 1] It's all right. We got you.
translation.zh: -抬起来 别急 -没事 有我们呢

translation.en: -We got you. -[man 4] Take it easy, Jørgensen.
[man 4] Hold these. Take it easy, Jørgensen.
translation.zh: 拿好 别急 约根森

translation.en: -Do you have some whiskey? -[man 1] Yes. Get the man a drink.
translation.zh: -有威士忌吗？ -有 给他来点酒
埃纳尔 按住他 来
约根森 呼吸 加油 保持呼吸
（1909年圣诞夜 格陵兰东北部）
好 有圣诞节的味道

translation.en: -It's about time we found a use for you. -[laughter]
[Ejnar] Gentlemen, can I have your attention?
translation.zh: -很不错 -先生们 容我说几句
-派对结束了 -安静 波尔森

translation.en: -I want you all to raise your glasses… -[crew] Of course.
to the men who gave their lives exploring the last unknown parts of our kingdom.
translation.zh: 敬为探索我们王国最后未知部分 而付出生命的探索者

translation.en: for joining me in fulfilling their mission.
translation.zh: 与我一同为完成他们的任务而努力

translation.en: Our long search didn't go quite as planned.
translation.zh: 我们的漫长的搜索 并没有像计划中那样顺利

translation.en: it was hard to trace any signs of the vanished expedition.
translation.zh: 寻找消失的探险队的踪迹非常困难

translation.en: A diary from one of the men.
that apparently shows the location of the cairn
translation.zh: 上面标注了一个石标的位置

translation.en: where Mylius-Erichsen left his final records of the unknown land.
translation.zh: 米留斯埃里克森 把未知土地的最终记录留在了那里

translation.en: A cairn's a stack of stones you can see from far away.
translation.zh: 就是一堆石头 在远处就能看到

translation.en: So, therefore, I'll attempt another journey.
translation.zh: 因此 我会尝试再去一趟

translation.en: Well, this time further, across the ice cap,
translation.zh: 这次要走得更远 穿过冰盖

translation.en: to retrieve the findings they left behind.
This is why we're here, boys.
translation.zh: 我们来这里就是为了这个 兄弟们

translation.en: Without these findings, the North of Greenland could be lost,
translation.zh: 没有这些记录 格陵兰北部可能会丢失
美国人说这些土地是他们的
现在约根森已经不能活动

translation.en: and I can't do it alone,
which provides one of you lucky boys with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.zh: 这也就给了你们其中一位幸运者 一个千载难逢的好机会

translation.en: I'll need a volunteer to accompany me.
translation.zh: 我需要一个人自告奋勇和我一起去

translation.en: [Poulsen] Aren't you next in line, Laub?
translation.zh: 下一位不是你吗 劳布？

translation.en: Shut up, Poulsen. Some of us have family.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 波尔森 我们有的人毕竟是有家庭的

translation.en: Why don't any of you want to go with him?
translation.zh: 你们为什么都不想和他一起去呢？

translation.en: It's like walking from Moscow to Rome looking for a stack of stones.
translation.zh: 就像从莫斯科走去罗马寻找一堆石头

translation.en: [Poulsen] Not to mention doing it with the captain.
translation.zh: 更不用说是和船长一起去

translation.en: He knew all about him before he came aboard, right?
translation.zh: 他来参加之前就很了解他了 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, I've read about him,

translation.zh: 但大家都看过 不是吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] Not everyone's a fan, Iver Iversen.
translation.zh: 并非所有人都崇拜他 艾弗·艾弗森

translation.en: -Not everyone can read. Right, Unger? -Try reading this!
translation.zh: 不是所有人都识字 对吧 昂格尔？ 这你肯定看得懂！

translation.en: I don't know how many volunteers you've had already--
translation.zh: 我不知道已经有多少人报名…

translation.en: [clears throat] What I'm trying to say is
technically, I'm out of a job.
translation.zh: 严格地说我现在没有工作

translation.en: As long as we're parked up here, the motor won't be needed.
translation.zh: 只要我们船停在这里 就不需要电机

translation.en: I'd like to come with you, if you'd allow me.
translation.zh: 我想跟你去 如果你同意

translation.en: I'm good with a rifle, and I'm learning how to drive the dogs.
translation.zh: 我很擅长打步枪 而且我在学习驾驭狗

translation.en: I'd really like to come, Captain.
translation.zh: 我真的很想去 船长

translation.en: I'll keep that in mind. Thank you, Iversen.
translation.zh: 我知道了 谢谢你 艾弗森
波尔森 把鞍具给我

translation.en: -Looks like he needs a hand. -[Iver] Stay there.
All of you stay here, okay?
translation.zh: 你们都待在这里 好吗？

translation.en: Here, let me give you a hand.
Iversen, the dogs work for you.
translation.zh: 艾弗森 狗为你工作

translation.en: each dog can pull a hundred pounds of weight from the start.
translation.zh: 每一条狗从一开始能拉100斤

translation.en: Once that hundred pounds has been eaten,
well, that dog becomes surplus to requirement.
So we shoot the worst dog,
translation.zh: 到时候我们就枪毙最坏的狗

translation.en: So, Iversen, don't become best friends.
translation.zh: 艾弗森 所以不要和它们交朋友
艾弗森提出要和我一起去 你听说了

translation.en: -[Laub] I have, sir. -What are your thoughts on him?
translation.zh: -我听说了 长官 -你对他有什么看法？

translation.en: Have you seen him with the dogs?
translation.zh: 你见他和狗在一起的样子了吗？

translation.en: Clearly he needs to work a bit harder to improve.
translation.zh: 很明显 他得更努力一些以提高技能

translation.en: But you think he can do it?

translation.zh: 是的 我觉得他能行

translation.en: [Unger] Don't be ridiculous. Surely that's too heavy.
translation.zh: 别开玩笑了 肯定太重了
我跟你说 绝对不可能沉没

translation.en: It's got combination turbines and reciprocating engines
translation.zh: 有组合涡轮和往复活塞式内燃机

translation.en: guaranteed to maintain a speed of 21 knots.
-Translation, anyone, please? -[man 1] What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -谁翻译一下 麻烦？ -你说什么啊 艾弗？

translation.en: [Laub] Is the Alabama not up to your standard?
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马号够不上你的标准吗？

translation.en: Go on about this with the captain, he'll put a bullet in your head.
translation.zh: 你跟船长说这种话 他会一枪打爆你的头

translation.en: Yeah, usually I'd say Poulsen's talking shit,
translation.zh: 对 通常我会说波尔森胡扯

translation.en: but I've gotta agree, I daren't say two words to him.
translation.zh: 但我得同意他的说法 我不敢对他有二话

translation.en: I have to say, Iver, I think you've lost your mind.
translation.zh: 艾弗 不得不说 我觉得你疯了

translation.en: What do you know about sledging, surviving on the ice when it's 40 below?
translation.zh: 零下40度 怎么拉雪橇 怎么在冰上生存 你懂什么？

translation.en: Yeah, and polar bears and all that other scary shit out there.
translation.zh: 对 还有北极熊什么的吓人玩意儿

translation.en: I think Iver has got quite the handle on those dogs now.
translation.zh: 我觉得艾弗现在对驾驭狗 已经很有一套了

translation.en: It's not too late to change your mind.
translation.zh: 现在改变主意还不晚 艾弗

translation.en: This is my third trip up here and I still hate those fucking dogs.
translation.zh: 这是我第三趟来了 我还是很他妈讨厌那些狗

translation.en: If they were any more inbred, they'd be sandwiches.
translation.zh: 那些狗再近亲交配的话 就成三明治了
没有 拜托 它们很好啊

translation.en: Once you learn to trust your lead dog, it kind of falls into place.
translation.zh: 一旦学会如何信任头犬 一切都会水到渠成

translation.en: Mine's Bjørn. He keeps the others in check.
translation.zh: 我的头犬是比约恩 它会管好别的狗

translation.en: Check out Iver and his new favorite dog, Bjørn!
translation.zh: 看看艾弗和他新近最爱的狗比约恩！

translation.en: I feel like I've let you down.
You need to get yourself right.
He wouldn't even be on this trip if our engine hadn't failed in Reykjavik.
translation.zh: 要不是我们的轮机在雷克雅未克坏掉 这次他都不会来

translation.en: Just look after Alabama for me.
translation.zh: 帮我照顾好阿拉巴马号

translation.en: You're not a young man anymore.
You're risking your life, Iversen's life.
translation.zh: 你在拿你自己和艾弗森的命冒险

translation.en: You want us to give up without trying?
translation.zh: 还没试试 你就想让我们放弃？

translation.en: Do you expect her to wait for you?
-You've got nothing to prove. -This is not about me.
translation.zh: 你不需要证明什么 这不是为了我

translation.en: The sea opens up by July.
If we're not back by August before the sea freezes, then you go.
translation.zh: 如果我们到了八月还没回来 在海面冰冻之前 你们就走

translation.en: -You'll basically be on your own. -That's an order.
translation.zh: -你们几乎就要全靠自己了 -这是命令

translation.en: Iversen is the best, if not the only, man willing to make the trip.
translation.zh: 艾弗森是最佳人选 不知他是不是唯一愿意去的人

translation.en: I respect your concern, but we are leaving tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你的担心 我予以尊重 但是我们明天就出发

translation.en: [Laub] Iver, stand closer to the captain.
translation.zh: 艾弗 靠近船长一点

translation.en: -[Poulsen] You too, Captain. -[Unger] All the best.
translation.zh: 你也保重 船长 一切顺利
谢谢 约根森 谢谢

translation.en: -Are we gonna try and get up there? -Well, there's always a way up.
translation.zh: -我们要试试上去吗？ -总有办法上去

translation.en: It's just finding the quickest route.
translation.zh: 只是要找到最快的路线

translation.en: I bet there's a quick way down too.
Mm, which is why I need you to concentrate at all times.
translation.zh: 所以我要你时刻击中注意力

translation.en: We need to get up to get across.
translation.zh: 要过去的话 我们必须得上去
一 二 三 拉

translation.en: It's like we've landed on the moon.
translation.zh: 就好像我们登上了月球似的

translation.en: How many cubic meters of ice do you think this is?
translation.zh: 你说这有多少立方米的冰啊？

translation.en: Must be at least two million, do you think?
translation.zh: 一定至少200万立方米 你说呢？

translation.en: I need you to watch where you're walking.
translation.zh: 你走路的时候要多注意

translation.en: [Iver] I'm reading this article you wrote about the Denmark Expedition.
translation.zh: 我在看你写的关于丹麦探险队的文章

translation.en: Now I'm here with you, reading your story.
translation.zh: 现在我在这里和你一起 读你的文章

translation.en: They had so much equipment, didn't they? They even had an automobile.
translation.zh: 他们当时有好多设备啊 甚至还有一辆汽车

translation.en: Imagine that! Driving across the ice.
translation.zh: 想象一下！开着车穿过冰面

translation.en: What type do you think it was, Captain? Crossley?
translation.zh: 你说是哪个牌子的车 船长？ 是克罗斯利牌吗？

translation.en: What horsepower was the engine? Can you remember?
translation.zh: 发动机有多少马力？你记得吗？

translation.en: Was it four to eight perhaps?
Captain, that's my lead dog, Bjørn.
translation.zh: 船长 是我的头犬比约恩

translation.en: I think he'd like to come in the tent. Would that be okay?
translation.zh: 它可能想进帐篷来 行吗？

translation.en: Little wonder they got lost out here.

translation.zh: 船长 我之前就想问

translation.en: what do you think really happened to the Denmark Expedition?
translation.zh: 你觉得丹麦探险队出了什么事？

translation.en: Sometimes, it's best not to think too much.
But he never knew when to give up.
translation.zh: 但他永远不知道什么时候该放弃

translation.en: The two others were lost in the ice.
translation.zh: 另外两人在冰雪中找不见了

translation.en: [Ejnar] His final words in the diary and the map were all that survived.
translation.zh: 只剩下他在日记中最后的话语 还有那张地图

translation.en: You never think you can't make it.
translation.zh: 人从不会觉得自己不行了

translation.en: You always believe there'll be a way.

translation.zh: 对不起 我们把你留在外面

translation.en: Captain told us we can't have you in if you make noise.
translation.zh: 船长说如果你吵闹就不能让你进去

translation.en: Captain, I've just put that on.
Well, let me show you something.
In Alaska, they do this in these conditions to go fast.
translation.zh: 在阿拉斯加 在这种情况下 如果想加快速度 就会这样做

translation.en: Just a thin layer of ice.
-See the cirrus clouds up in the north? -No, Captain.
translation.zh: 看见北边的卷云了吗？ 没有 船长

translation.en: The dogs are smelling land! Slow down!
translation.zh: 狗闻到陆地的味道了！慢一点！

translation.en: I can see him! It's Bjørn.
Get up! We'll pull the sledge up.
translation.zh: 上来！我们把雪橇拉上来

translation.en: I've lost us two weeks' worth of dog food,
I've lost us half our tea and one can of paraffin.
translation.zh: 我还弄丢了我们一半的茶叶 还有一罐石蜡

translation.en: -And Bjørn, Captain. -It's just a dog, Iversen.
translation.zh: -还有比约恩 船长 -它只是一条狗 艾弗森

translation.en: Bringing you with me was always a risk,
translation.zh: 我带上你 总是有风险

translation.en: but I judged your Navy background would arm you with the necessary discipline
translation.zh: 但我以为你的海军背景 会使你有遵守命令的必要纪律
会使你有遵守命令的必要纪律

translation.en: [sighs] Well, at least tomorrow, we'll be off the ice cap.
translation.zh: 好吧 至少明天我们就下冰盖了

translation.en: can I ask you a personal question?
translation.zh: 能问你一个私人问题吗？

translation.en: out here, in places like this?
translation.zh: 在这里 在这样的地方

translation.en: Don't you have… Don't you have someone special at home waiting for you?
translation.zh: 难道没有特别的人在家等你吗？

translation.en: You can't have your mind some 2,000 miles away.
translation.zh: 不能想着3000公里以外的事

translation.en: So, why do you do this?
translation.zh: 那你为什么要做这一行呢？

translation.en: Why does anyone do anything? Why are you a mechanic?
translation.zh: 人做事有理由吗？你为什么做机工？

translation.en: It's all I was good at, fixing engines.
translation.zh: 我只擅长做这个 修轮机

translation.en: What did they tell you back when you joined us in Reykjavik?
translation.zh: 你在雷克雅未克加入我们的时候 他们是怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: Well, I know it's to do with the Americans
and their claim of some land.
translation.zh: 他们说有一些土地是他们的

translation.en: I was just excited to go on a trip to Greenland with you
translation.zh: 我只是很想和你一起去格陵兰
我们要探索的是未知土地 艾弗森
美国人说格陵兰的最北部

translation.en: that the top of Greenland is separated by a channel
translation.zh: 美国人说格陵兰的最北部 由一条海峡与格陵兰的其他部分分开

translation.en: from the rest of the country,
translation.zh: 由一条海峡与格陵兰的其他部分分开

translation.en: but no one's proved it yet.
translation.zh: 但还没有人证明这一点

translation.en: Might even make you famous, Iversen.
translation.zh: 甚至可能让你出名 艾弗森

translation.en: Me, famous? I doubt the ladies would be queuing up for me.
translation.zh: 我出名？女人们恐怕不会排着队找我

translation.en: Well, don't get ahead of yourself.
First, we have to find the bloody thing.
translation.zh: 我们先得找到那他妈东西

translation.en: -I call her Miss Affection. -You named her?
translation.zh: -我叫她爱慕小姐 -你给她取了名字？

translation.en: -Miss Affection. -What sort of name is that?
-[Ejnar] What about this one? -The small, smiley one?
-She'd laugh at my jokes. -She'd laugh at the stupid name.
translation.zh: 她听我讲笑话总是笑 她听到你给她取的傻名字才会笑

translation.en: Is there one that catches your eye, Captain?
translation.zh: 有你相中的吗 船长？

translation.en: [Ejnar] I rather like this one. Has she got a name?
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个 她有名字吗？

translation.en: [Ejnar] I'm going to call her Naja.
Unless any man here should know of any impediment,
translation.zh: 除非这里有人有正当理由反对

translation.en: you and Naja shall be together from this day on.
translation.zh: 你和娜雅从今天开始永结连理

translation.en: No life here. I didn't even see a bird.
translation.zh: 这里没有生命 我连一只鸟都没看见

translation.en: -I've not done anything. -You must've done something.
It's not working anymore. Are you a complete idiot?
translation.zh: 现在不管用了 你是不是笨蛋啊？
-没这个我们就完蛋了 -船长 我…

translation.en: Without the Primus, we're as good as dead, understand?
translation.zh: 没有煤油炉 我们就死定了 明白吗？

translation.en: -You do understand that? -Can you pass the kettle, Captain?
translation.zh: -你明白吗？ -把水壶递给我 船长

translation.en: We'll have to go half ration from now on.
translation.zh: 从现在开始我们必须食物配给减半

translation.en: Now, we have a slight course correction we need to make.
translation.zh: 现在我们得稍微调整一下方向

translation.en: Is there a point where perhaps we…
translation.zh: 到某一个程度 我们也许是不是应该…
不是 船长 是因为…

translation.en: We have a map. We will find it.
translation.zh: 我们有地图 我们一定会找到它

translation.en: We won't find it by standing around talking.
And we will be back on the Alabama by August.
translation.zh: 而且我们八月会回到阿拉巴马号

translation.en: We're going down to one sledge.

translation.zh: 船长 他们来过这里
他们来过这里 船长

translation.en: "Being without food for ourselves and our dogs,
translation.zh: 我们已经没有食物 给我们自己和我们的狗吃

translation.en: we must leave this place and try to make our way to coastal areas with game,
translation.zh: 我们必须离开这里 努力抵达海岸区域 有野味充饥

translation.en: enough to sledge the 580 miles back to the ship."
translation.zh: 我们足以坐雪橇前行930公里 回到船上”

translation.en: They had no food, Captain, but they left this.
translation.zh: 船长 他们没有食物 却还留下了这个

translation.en: "We discovered and leave a proof in this cairn
translation.zh: “我们发现皮列海峡并不存在

translation.en: that Peary Channel does not exist."
translation.zh: 并在这座石标中留下了证据

translation.en: "Navy Cliff is joined by land to Heilprin Land,
translation.zh: 海军悬崖通过陆地连接海尔普林地

translation.en: therefore our work is almost done."
translation.zh: 因此我们的工作已基本完成

translation.en: "We hope to reach the ship before the end of September, with or without dogs."
translation.zh: 我们希望在九月末上船 不论有没有狗
丹麦东北格陵兰探险队队长

translation.en: leader of Denmark Expedition to Northeast Greenland."
Robert Peary and the Americans were wrong.
translation.zh: 罗伯特·皮列和美国人都错了

translation.en: I don't really understand why what we found is so important,
translation.zh: 我不太明白 为什么我们找到的东西如此重要

translation.en: but seeing you smile, Captain, seeing you laugh…
translation.zh: 但是船长 看见你笑开了花…

translation.en: The USA has no claim here.
Denmark will thank you one day, Iver Iversen.
translation.zh: 丹麦有一天会感谢你 艾弗·艾弗森

translation.en: It's time to celebrate. Now you put that soup on.
translation.zh: 是时候庆祝了 你把汤烧上

translation.en: We can go home now, Iversen.
translation.zh: 我们现在可以回家了 艾弗森

translation.en: Like walking from Rome to Moscow looking for a stack of stones.
translation.zh: 就像从莫斯科走去罗马寻找一堆石头

translation.en: That's what the guys were saying on the ship.
Well, you can put them straight now.
translation.zh: 现在你可以打脸他们了
要回家了 敬阿拉巴马号

translation.en: Do you think we could eat the liver?
The rest is skin and bone.

translation.zh: 它是累死 会有毒吗？

translation.en: But what's that thing about a silver spoon in a pot with anything poisonous?
translation.zh: 但不是说银勺能测试有没有毒吗？

translation.en: Shame we don't have any silver.
You said you didn't have anyone back home.
-I don't remember. -No, I don't remember either.
-That's… not green. -That's more brown than green.
translation.zh: -不是绿色 -相比绿色 更像棕色

translation.en: I can't believe this was the only thing that got torn.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 熊居然没把你撕碎
我想念的是女性的陪伴

translation.en: [sighs] They're different, aren't they? Their voices, their smell.
translation.zh: 女性不一样 不是吗？ 她们的声音和气味
我倒是想念她们的笑声

translation.en: I remember when I was 16, about to join the Navy,
translation.zh: 我记得我16岁的时候 就要加入海军了

translation.en: my grandfather asked if I'd go with him to Copenhagen Harbor.
translation.zh: 我爷爷问我 愿不愿意和他一起去哥本哈根港

translation.en: I thought we were going to look at ships, so I went along,
translation.zh: 我以为我们去看船 所以我去了

translation.en: even packing a lunch for the two of us,
He wanted to make sure I was ready to set sail
translation.zh: 他要我作好启航的准备

translation.en: and, in his words, "be a man."
translation.zh: 用他的话说就是：“成为一个男人”

translation.en: So he took me to the red-light district
translation.zh: 于是他带我去了红灯区

translation.en: make sure I wasn't embarrassed on my travels.
translation.zh: 让我以后出行不会尴尬

translation.en: [chuckles] I just went along with it.
Ended up with this older woman.
translation.zh: 结果给我找了一个年纪大一些的女人

translation.en: she did expand my knowledge greatly.
translation.zh: 她确实教会了我很多知识

translation.en: my dad took me to the hospital,
to show me the dire consequences of such behavior.
translation.zh: 让我看看这种行为的可怕后果

translation.en: We have to travel light if we're gonna make it.
translation.zh: 我们必须轻装上阵才能回得去

translation.en: We'll leave everything that's not absolutely vital.
translation.zh: 除非绝对必须 否则全部抛弃

translation.en: There's another 200 miles to the ship.
-Why can't we go around? -We won't have time.
translation.zh: -为什么不能绕过去？ -我们没时间了

translation.en: We need to build a cairn.
You don't think we can make it, do you?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们回不去了 是吧？

translation.en: If we don't, we lose everything.
translation.zh: 如果我们回不去 就会丧失一切

translation.en: [Ejnar] At least if the proof and our journals are kept here in a cairn,
translation.zh: 如果证据和我们的日记 在这里的石标中予以保存

translation.en: This is what happened to Mylius-Erichsen, isn't it?
translation.zh: 米留斯埃里克森的结局就是这样吧？

translation.en: I just need to lie down for a second.
[Iver] Sound the bell! -[Ejnar laughs] -Sound the bell!
They've built a hut with parts of the ship.
translation.zh: 他们用船的部件建了一个小屋

translation.en: No, they've left us! They've left us!
translation.zh: 不是吧 他们把我们丢下了！
我们别无选择 长官

translation.en: The Alabama was wrecked, crushed by the ice.
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马号失事了 被冰撞毁了

translation.en: We had to leave when we had the chance.
We left enough food to last at least a year.
translation.zh: 我们留下了足够吃一年的食物

translation.en: -[official] Let's pray they make it back. -They want more than prayers.
translation.zh: 我们祈祷他们能活着回来 他们需要的不只是祈祷

translation.en: You're asking the government to fund another rescue attempt. Is that correct?
translation.zh: 你们要政府出资再进行一次营救 是吗？

translation.en: Lieutenant Laub, it's not your first visit to the Arctic, is it?
translation.zh: 劳布中尉 这不是你第一次去北极 对吧？

translation.en: No, sir. It was my fourth.
translation.zh: 没错 长官 是我第四次去

translation.en: And who is this man, Iver Iversen?
translation.zh: 这个艾弗·艾弗森是什么人？
是我们的机工 长官

translation.en: His name is not on the original crew list.
translation.zh: 他的名字不在原先的船员名单上

translation.en: [official] No. He joined Alabama in Reykjavik.
translation.zh: 是的 他是在雷克雅未克上了阿拉巴马号

translation.en: And how come a mechanic is chosen to accompany Mikkelsen on the second sled journey?
translation.zh: 第二次雪橇旅行 怎么会派一个机工和米克森一起去？

translation.en: Did he have any experience as an Arctic explorer?
translation.zh: 他有北极探险的经验吗？

translation.en: This was his first time in the Arctic.
So, three dead men the first time around and now two more on the rescue attempt.
translation.zh: 也就是说第一次死了三个人 现在营救过程中又死了两个

translation.en: Sir, there's no proof that they're--
translation.zh: 长官 没有证据证明他们已经…

translation.en: Now, you two both knew that the chances of success were minimal.
translation.zh: 现在你们两个都很清楚 成功的概率极小

translation.en: Even less so when you allow an inexperienced greenhorn
translation.zh: 你们允许一个没经验的菜鸟 自告奋勇去找死

translation.en: to volunteer for an early death.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下 概率就更小了

translation.en: I can't possibly justify more expense on another fruitless mission.
translation.zh: 我无法安排更多费用 用于又一次毫无成果的任务

translation.en: Minister, nobody wants to waste government funds.
translation.zh: 部长 没人想浪费政府的资金

translation.en: We were rescued by a whaler.
translation.zh: 我们是被一艘捕鲸船所救

translation.en: Perhaps if we can put up a reward.
translation.zh: 我们是不是可以悬赏呢？
-真不敢相信他们会丢下我们 -对啊

translation.en: They got picked up by a passing ship.
The same will happen to us.

translation.zh: 那张明信片在你那里吗？

translation.en: Imagine if they could see us now.
translation.zh: 想象一下 要是她们现在能看见我们

translation.en: What would you do if a girl suddenly came walking towards us
translation.zh: 如果突然有一个姑娘 从冰上朝我们走来

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, that's not gonna happen. No, but if it did?
-Is that the guy that went missing? -Yeah. I met him once.
translation.zh: -是失踪的那个人吗？ -嗯 我见过他一次

translation.en: I walked all the way from Copenhagen to Gothenburg to see him.
translation.zh: 我大老远从哥本哈根 走到哥德堡去见他

translation.en: He was gonna fly his hot-air balloon to the North Pole.
translation.zh: 他打算坐他的热气球去北极

translation.en: I wanted to join his expedition.
[sarcastic] Bet he was thrilled to meet a 15-year-old you!
translation.zh: 他见到15岁的你一定很激动

translation.en: He explained to me that I was too young,
translation.zh: 他对我说 我年纪太小了

translation.en: but then he paid for me to catch the train back to Copenhagen.
translation.zh: 但然后他给我钱坐火车回了哥本哈根

translation.en: I guess, in a way, he saved my life.
translation.zh: 在某种程度上说 我想他救了我的命

translation.en: To get the journals and the proof.
-We should never have left it. -Right now?
translation.zh: -我们就不该放在那里 -现在去？

translation.en: We need to get back here for when the sea opens up again.
translation.zh: 我们得在海面解冻的时候回来

translation.en: -Do you think we should leave a note? -No, Iver.
translation.zh: -你说我们要不要留个条子？ -不要 艾弗

translation.en: As I told you, we'll be back before the ice breaks.
translation.zh: 我跟你说了 我们会在冰面融化之前回来

translation.en: Yeah, but it's 200 miles there and 200 miles back.
translation.zh: 嗯 但是单程都要300多公里

translation.en: For the love of God, can we just get going?
translation.zh: 天哪！别废话了 我们出发吧？

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
translation.zh: 老话说 每个梦中都有真相

translation.en: Well, I hope for your sake there's no truth in my dreams.
translation.zh: 希望我的梦中没有真相 为了你好啊！

translation.en: I mean, I really couldn't go back.
translation.zh: 要是东西没了 真的没脸回去
想象一下回到哥本哈根

translation.en: "Oh, sorry, sir. It got eaten by a bear."
translation.zh: “对不起 长官 被熊吃了”

translation.en: What do you think did this?
They say there's truth in every dream, Iversen. They say there's truth in every dream.
translation.zh: 艾弗森 老话说 每个梦中都有真相

translation.en: Is that it, Captain? Is that…
Is that the car… from the Denmark Expedition?
translation.zh: 是不是那辆车？ 丹麦探险队的车？

translation.en: I'm just saying it could've been worse. Could've been worse.

translation.zh: -要是我们… -别耍小聪明 艾弗

translation.en: I know what you want to say.
Yes, we should've left a fucking note!
translation.zh: 是的 我们要是他妈留一张条子就好了！

translation.en: [Jørgensen] Minister, when the sailor found the hut, it was boarded up.
translation.zh: 部长 水手发现小屋的时候 小屋被板封起来了

translation.en: We never left it like that. Someone's been there.
translation.zh: 我们离开时并不是那样的 有人去了那里

translation.en: Do you mind if we walk and talk?
-I know you're a very busy man. -Busy?
Thank you. The whole nation seems to be rattling a begging bowl.
translation.zh: 谢谢 全国好像都在问我要钱

translation.en: Then there's this Greenland issue where we have to convince our own people
translation.zh: 关于这格陵兰的问题 我们要说服人民

translation.en: that it's financially viable to maintain these wretched colonies,
translation.zh: 维持这些悲惨的殖民地 在经济上仍然是可行的

translation.en: whilst trying to persuade the rest of the world
translation.zh: 同时还要努力说服全世界

translation.en: that we still have some semblance of control.
translation.zh: 我们对这些地方有一定的控制力
不管怎么说 关于营救米克森的事

translation.en: We appreciate and understand the importance of the work he undertook, of course.
translation.zh: 我们当然明白也理解 他从事的工作的重要性

translation.en: Sticking their little flags in the ice all over the place
translation.zh: 把他们的小旗子在那里的冰上到处插

translation.en: and this bloody Peary chap claiming the North Pole.
translation.zh: 还有那个他妈叫皮列的人 说北极是他们的

translation.en: We can't have that. It's ridiculous.
translation.zh: 不能让他们得逞 太荒唐了

translation.en: I'm confident that the captain secured the evidence.
translation.zh: 我相信船长一定已经拿到证据

translation.en: But you don't know that, do you?
Nor do you know where in this vast country we should send a rescue mission.
translation.zh: 而且那地方那么大 你也不知道我们该往哪里派救援队

translation.en: -I know this is difficult for you to bear. -They won't survive another year.
translation.zh: 我知道你很难接受 他们不可能再撑一年

translation.en: If we don't get a ship there before the ice freezes next summer,
translation.zh: 要是不在明年夏天结冰之前派船去

translation.en: not only do we give up on them, but we also give up on Greenland.
translation.zh: 我们不光是放弃了他们 就连格陵兰也放弃了

translation.en: We have already offered a very generous reward.
translation.zh: 我们已经提出巨额悬赏

translation.en: More than that, I cannot do.
translation.zh: 除此之外 我别无办法

translation.en: -But would you, Captain? -Honestly, Iver, I don't know.
translation.zh: -但是你会吗 船长？ -艾弗 说实话 我不知道

translation.en: Actually, can we just leave it?
translation.zh: 我们能不能别说这个了？

translation.en: This is our first Christmas here, in the hut?
translation.zh: 这是我们在这小屋的第一个圣诞节？
对 在小屋的第二个
-圣诞快乐 艾弗 -圣诞快乐 船长

translation.en: I'll tell you something that I know for certain.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 有一件事我很明确

translation.en: It's that whilst you still had your hands, I couldn't…
translation.zh: 在你还有手的时候 我没办法…

translation.en: Or at the very least fingers.
translation.zh: 或者至少是还有手指的时候

translation.en: I don't like talking about it or thinking about it,
translation.zh: 嗯 我不想谈论或者考虑这个问题

translation.en: but for me, it's hands that distinguish humans from animals.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 人与动物的区别在于手

translation.en: It's with our hands we can do all the things that animals can't do.
translation.zh: 我们可以用手做动物做不到的事

translation.en: So if my hands were removed before I die?
translation.zh: 那要是我死之前手被切掉了？

translation.en: Yeah, then… Yeah, I could quite happily eat you.
translation.zh: 嗯 那我就能开心地把你吃了

translation.en: I just missed you so much.
Captain, it's getting cold out here. Come back inside.
translation.zh: 船长 这里外头好冷啊 回屋里去吧

translation.en: The ice isn't completely impassable yet, is it?
translation.zh: 冰面现在还不是完全无法通过 对吧？

translation.en: I think he's taken it hard.
translation.zh: 我觉得他受了很大的打击

translation.en: I think he's blaming me for missing the ship.
translation.zh: 我想他在责怪我错过了那艘船

translation.en: We need to keep an eye on him,
make sure things don't get too much.
Do you believe in ghosts, Captain? Ghosts?
No. Just up on the hill.
Wh-what do you mean you met him?
You sensed him? You felt his presence?
translation.zh: 你感觉到他了？觉得他在这里？

translation.en: I think he may have passed away
translation.zh: 我觉得在我们在这里的这段时间里

translation.en: It doesn't necessarily mean he's dead.
I'm sorry. I'm… I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起 真的很对不起

translation.en: -If there's anything I can, you know-- -I know.
translation.zh: -如果有什么我能做的 你知道… -我知道
你永远都在这里陪着我

translation.en: [Naja] What if you never come home?
translation.zh: 要是你永远回不了家呢？

translation.en: -We were going to get married. -I didn't have an option.
translation.zh: -我们原本要结婚了 -我别无选择

translation.en: -I couldn't see another way. -Someone else could do this. Why you?
translation.zh: -我没别的办法 -别人也可以去 为什么非要你去？

translation.en: No one else could have done this.
translation.zh: 别人都不可能做成这件事

translation.en: I don't know why it had to be me, but it did. It was always going to be me.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么非得我去 但事实如此 总是我去

translation.en: What about Iver? Did he have a choice?
translation.zh: 那艾弗呢？ 他有选择吗？

translation.en: He volunteered. He knew the dangers.
translation.zh: 他是自告奋勇的 他早就知道其中的危险

translation.en: You do know that no one is coming to get you?
translation.zh: 没人来救你们 你知道的吧？
没事 是这里 很讨厌

translation.en: Get out. Get out! Get out!
How's the, um, neck holding up?
I almost feel guilty about it.
but I guess last night, she decided to pick me,
translation.zh: 不过昨晚她似乎是选了我

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
Did you see the tracks outside?
translation.zh: 你看见外面的动物脚印了吗？

translation.en: I'll go and have a look. Might be a rabbit or something.
translation.zh: 我去看看 也许是兔子什么的

translation.en: [Ejnar] You took her! You took her! You took her!
-Captain, put it down. -[Naja] Don't do this!
-Calm down. -[Naja] Don't do this. It's not real.
translation.zh: 冷静一点 别这样 这不是真的

translation.en: -Don't do this! -[Iver] Put the gun down.

translation.zh: -埃纳尔 住手！ -这不是真的！

translation.en: How much food do we have left?

translation.zh: -弹药呢？ -我们原本有两个弹夹

translation.en: One chance. One shot. Don't miss.
translation.zh: 一次机会 一枪毙命 别打偏了

translation.en: [Neergaard] What is the single most important task for an explorer?
translation.zh: 对于探险者来说 什么是最重要的任务？

translation.en: When you travel into unknown lands to discover new parts of the globe,
translation.zh: 当你前往未知土地 去发现地球的新区域时

translation.en: it is to ensure the records of your discoveries are delivered back safe and sound,
translation.zh: 最重要的是确保你发现的记录 安全无虞地送回

translation.en: Otherwise, it is all in vain.
The blood, sweat and tears would all be for nothing.
translation.zh: 一切鲜血、汗水和眼泪都付诸东流

translation.en: Unlike the honorable members of the Danish press,
translation.zh: 与可敬的丹麦媒体不同

translation.en: we in the Danish government never doubted for a second
translation.zh: 我们丹麦政府从未怀疑

translation.en: that Captain Mikkelsen would return home safe and sound.
translation.zh: 米克森船长将会安全地归来

translation.en: We played our part in ensuring the safe return of a Danish hero.
translation.zh: 在丹麦英雄安全归国的过程中 我们做了自己该做的事
你之前还想上那艘船工作的

translation.en: I wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you.
translation.zh: 要不是你 我现在不可能站在这里

translation.en: "Based on the findings brought back by Captain Ejnar Mikkelsen,
translation.zh: 根据埃纳尔·米克森船长 带回的调查结果

translation.en: that Peary Land is not an island,

translation.zh: -嗯？ -是不是有一个女人站在那里？

translation.en: -[Neergaard] It gives me great pleasure… -Congratulations, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 我很荣幸… 祝贺你们 两位先生

translation.en: …to be the first person to welcome home
the men who made the impossible possible.
translation.zh: 他们完成了不可能完成的任务

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss… -Holm.
It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss Holm.

translation.zh: 有请埃纳尔·米克森船长
去吧 他们在等你们

translation.en: [chuckles] They have returned, I promise you!
translation.zh: 他们确实回来了 我向大家保证
-部长 这位是艾弗·艾弗森 -谢谢长官
